summary: A young woman commits a hit-and-run, then finds her fate tied to her victim.
cast: Mena Suvari|Stephen Rea|Russell Hornsby|Rukiya Bernard|Carolyn Purdy-Gordon|Lionel Mark Smith|Wayne Robson|R.D. Reid|Patrick McKenna|Sharlene Royer|Bunthivy Nou|Suzanne Short|Wally MacKinnon|John Dartt|Liam McNamara|Shuko Akune|John Dunsworth|Marguerite McNeil|Jeffrey Combs|Martin Moreno|Lorena Rincon|Mauricio Hoyos|Brian Johnson
title: Stuck
